meta.title: Web Development Portfolio | Kris French Web Development
meta.description: Freelance web developer located in Zushi that specializes in modern, bilingual websites that help local businesses grow.

hero.headline: Building Websites That Connect With Your Customers
hero.subheadline: I create modern, bilingual websites for local businesses around the Zushi, Hayama, and Kamakura area.

intro.heading: Your Local Web Development Partner
intro.body: I help small businesses in the Shonan area reach more customers through fast, mobile-friendly websites in both English and Japanese.

servicesPreview.heading: What I Offer
servicesPreview.description: From custom site builds to hosting and ongoing maintenance, I provide solutions that make your business stand out online.

projectsPreview.heading: Featured Projects
projectsPreview.description: Take a look at some of my recent work for local and international clients.

testimonialsPreview.heading: What My Clients Say
